title: Craving Lucy
description: USA Today Bestselling Author Terri Anne Browning’s New Adult series.  One kiss can change everything…  I wished I’d known that before I’d kissed my best friend.  Things are different now. We can’t go back. I’m not even sure I want to go back. I guess the question is….  What happens now?     ***WARNING***  This book does end in a cliffhanger and will be resolved in SHATTERING LUCY in 2016.
author: Terri Anne Browning
